name: gccsa_w11d_ind_of_emp_by_hrs_work_by_sx_census_2016
title: GCCSA-W11d Industry of Employment by Hours Worked by Sex-Census 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Australia (CC BY 2.5 AU)

keyword: w11d,employment,wpp,hours worked,work,2016,working population profile,census,industry,industry of employment,
abstract:
GCCSA based data for Industry of Employment by Hours Worked by Sex, in Working Population Profile (WPP), 2016 Census. Count of employed persons aged 15 years and over. Hours worked is an aggregate of the number of hours worked in all jobs during the week prior to Census Night. W11 is broken up into 4 sections (W11a - W11d), this section contains 'Persons Other services Number of hours worked None' - 'Persons Total Number of hours worked Total'. The data is by GCCSA 2016 boundaries. Periodicity: 5-Yearly.
Note: There are small random adjustments made to all cell values to protect the confidentiality of data. These adjustments may cause the sum of rows or columns to differ by small amounts from table totals.
For more information visit the data source: http://www.abs.gov.au/census.
